title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 680.3 - Duties of mental health professionals certification committee
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 680.3 - Duties of mental health professionals certification committee

State Regulations

Subject to the supervision of the

Presiding Justices of the Appellate Division of the First and Second Judicial

Departments, the mental health professionals certification committee shall
establish procedures for: (a) the appointment of applicants for
membership on the panel of mental health professionals; (b) periodic evaluation of
panel members; (c) training of panel members; (d) investigating complaints made
against panel members; and
(e) removal of mental health
professionals from the panel. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22
ยง
680.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
